Name: IIS Website - Add Release to response header
Description: Adds the Octopus Release number to the response header. When you browser to your site you can look at the response header to verify the build number that is loading

Parameters.Name: FieldName
Parameters.Label: Field name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the the Field name you want the release to show as.

Parameters.Name: WebsiteName
Parameters.Label: Website name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the site in IIS
